div.p: My name’s Sue [Unerman 0:00:01] and I’m chief strategy officer at [Mediacom]. The
digital strategy matters because it’s the biggest single thing that’s transforming
our lives, both personally and from a business basis that I think we’ve seen in our lifetimes.
The consumer is at very different levels with how they’re dealing with digital, so there
are some people who have taken to it like a duck to water; there are the digital natives
who are growing up with it, 16, 17, 18-year-olds who are growing up with it; and then there
are people who are finding it difficult to grasp.
This project matters because it has such huge efficiencies and such huge power in it, but
at the same time, it needs to be delivered in a way that doesn’t put people off, that
people don’t find frightening, that means that everybody can do and use it in the best
possible way. If we can achieve that, then we arrive at a new Britain.
